Su confección lo realiza en su propio taller que acondicionó en su casa, junto a su esposa y uno de sus familiares  trabajan en su mismo taller, cuando hay más pedidos contrata los servicios de 2 personas más, que llevan este trabajo a sus mismas casas con el fin de ahorrar la energía eléctrica. Disfruta de realizar este trabajo porque desde su niñez le enseñaron y le ha permitido disfrutar de agradables momentos  con su familia, por los años de experiencia  en este trabajo ya tiene clientes fijos que siempre solicitan  estas faldas además que siempre adquieren nuevos clientes a recomendación del buen trabajo que realiza. Ahora desea mejorar su taller e equiparlo para poder cubrir los pedidos a otras ciudades. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “héroes al progreso” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde le agrada saber que es parte de un grupo de personas a las que considera como parte de su familia y puede aprender mucho de ellas. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Raúl de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de telas y una máquina industrial para realizar sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Raul, 54, lives with his wife and two of their three children, whom they care for in the house they own in Azapampa. For 31 years he has made skirts that are typical of his region which are called faldas plisadas [pleated skirts]. He makes the garments in his own workshop that he set up in his house, together with his wife and one of his relatives who works in the same shop. When they have a lot of orders he hires two more people who work in their own homes, in order to save electricity. He enjoys his work because he learned it from childhood and it has given him some good times with his family. 

Because of his many years of experience he has a set clientele who always make orders for the skirts, and he's also always acquiring new customers due to good word of mouth. Now he wants to improve his workshop and equip it to be able to handle orders from other cities. 

He's part of the lending group "Heroes al Progreso" and this is his 5th credit with MFP, where he likes knowing that he's part of a group of people that he considers family and from whom he can learn a lot. He promises to be punctual with his payments. On receipt of his loan, Raul will invest the money in the purchase of fabrics and an industrial sewing machine for making his garments.

loans.use: to buy fabric and an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier tiene 37 años, vive con su esposa y su hijo temporalmente en casa de sus padres. Ubicada en la localidad de Azapampa. Desde hace 8 años ofrece su servicio de construcción, siempre está pendiente de ofrecer sus servicios y concretarlo en contratos de varios meses hasta concluir el acuerdo de construcción de las diversas edificaciones que le encomiendan, desde casas hasta obras publicas de su localidad, dispone de sus propias herramientas de trabajo que le permiten ofrecer un servicio de calidad y  lo conocen en su comunidad como un maestro de obra. Ahora desea comenzar con la construcción de su propia casa que es uno de sus grandes anhelos, ya comenzó comprando un pequeño terreno. Su experiencia y las buenas referencias de su trabajo son las mejores garantías para ofrecer su servicio y ha visto a lo largo de los años el fruto de su esfuerzo. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “héroes al progreso” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde ha visto unidad en su grupo y siente que puede tener confianza con los demás integrantes, pues son responsables como él y pagarán sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Javier de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas de construcción para realizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Javier is 37 years old and lives with his wife and son, temporarily at his parent’s house, located in Azapampa.  He’s been doing construction work for the past eight years and is always looking to offer his services and get contracts lasting various months, completing diverse buildings requested, from homes to public works in his area.  He has his own tools that allow him to offer quality service and he’s known throughout the community for being a master laborer.

Now he wants to start building his own house, which is one of his greatest desires.  He already bought a small lot.  His experience and good job references are the best guarantees of his services and he has seen the long range fruits of his labor.

He’s a member of the “héroes al progreso” group and this will be his fourth loan through MFP, where he’s seen his group’s solidarity.  He trusts the other members.  Like him, they are responsible and make their payments on schedule.

Javier will use the money from this loan to buy construction tools to be able to do his work.

loans.use: to buy tools for his work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sfresh fish.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana de 18 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de su mamá, hermanos y su menor hijo de 9 meses de edad, al que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Aymará. A pesar de las responsabilidades que tiene que afrontar. Está talentosa mujer tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante para el bienestar de su familia. Todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano, pues tiene que cuidar de sus animales y preparar el desayuno para sus hermanos. Ya por las tardes, estudia en un colegio cerca de su casa. Ella sabe que tiene que forjarse un futuro por su pequeño hijo “José”, es así que quiere incursionar en la crianza de cerdos. Cuidarlos y vender su carne al por mayor. Por ello incursionó dentro de su asociación, ya que será el socio estratégico que necesita. Además cuenta que dentro de poco comenzará a trabajar en el “Wawahuasi” de su localidad, una especie de centro de estimulación para niños menores de 4 años; ahí recibirá un sueldo mensual de parte del estado. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Aymara” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente desarrollada, ya que recibirá la ayuda económica que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Por ello promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas.
Roxana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de cerdos en gran cantidad, para cuidarlos y alimentarlos.
texts.en:
Roxana is 18 years old and is a very responsible lady.  She lives with her mother, brothers, and youngest son of nine months.  She cares for him in her own home, located in Aymará.  Aside from her other responsibilities, this talented woman has a great desire to come out ahead for her family’s well-being.  She gets up early every morning to care for her animals and prepare her brothers’ breakfast.  She also attends school near her home in the evenings.  She knows that she has to forge a future for her young son, José, so she wants to begin raising pigs, caring for them, and then selling pork in quantity.  She joined the organization because it was the strategic association that she needed.  She will also shortly begin working for “Wawahuasi” in her area.  This is a center for children four years of age and younger.  She will receive a monthly salary from the state.

She’s a member of the “Aymara” group and this will be her first loan through MFP.  She feels well developed now that she’ll receive financial support that she needs to meet her objectives.  She will be punctual with her payments.

Roxana will invest the money from this loan to buy pigs in quantity to raise and feed.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Basilio Jacinto

texts.es:
El señor Basilio Jacinto es casado, tiene 41 año de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos, se dedica a la artesanía, a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inició este negocio con su familia y lleva 30 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuanta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al comercio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente clases y colores para mejorar su negocio. Espera en el futuro tener una fabrica.
texts.en:
Basilio Jacinto is 41 year old, married, and has eight children.  He didn’t have the opportunity to go to school and makes knitted articles, having started this business with his family 30 years ago.  His wife is a merchant and helps him.

He is asking for this loan to buy different types and colors of yarn to improve his business.  He hopes to have a factory in the future.

loans.use: to buy yarn

loans.name: Reyna Esmeralda

texts.es: Reyna Esmeralda tiene 53 años de edad y reside en el Municipio de Patuca, Olancho. Desde muy temprana edad comenzo a vender queso en los alrededores de la comunidad y poco a poco con el apoyo de los prestamos obtenidos en FAMA a ido diversificando su negocio y ahora tambien cuenta con una pollera que tiene instalada en el patio de su casa. Ella sola atiende sus negocios y lo hace desde muy temprano por la mañana. Doña Reyna solicita el prestamo para comprar mas libras de queso y comprar mas pollitos ya que se avecina la navidad y espera que sus ventas aumenten. Su mayor deseo es hacer crecer su negocio y que este le permita humildemente seguir sosteniendo a su familia. Reyna ha sido clienta de FAMA por varios años y siempre ha pagado puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en: Reyna Esmeralda is 53 years old and lives in the city of Patuca, Olancho.  She began selling cheese around the city at a very young age and she has been diversifying with the help of the loans she’s gotten through FAMA.  She also has a chicken coup on her patio and runs her business on her own starting early in the morning.  Reyna is asking for this loan to buy more cheese and chickens; now that Christmas is approaching she expects her sales to increase.  Her greatest desire is to grow her business and that it allows her to continue supporting her family.  Reyna has been a FAMA client for several years and has always made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buys cheese and chickens

loans.name: Sugey Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sugey, quiere aumentar su negocio para esta temporada, por eso se acerco a solicitar un nuevo préstamo e invertirlo en lociones para ofrecer a la clientela, ya que se acerca el tiempo de regalar por eso quiere mantener en el negocio variedad de lociones que pueden ser una opción para regalar.
Ella ha tenido una buena experiencia en la administración de estos préstamos, y han sido para ella y su familia una gran fortaleza para aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Sugey wants to expand her business for this season which is why she approached the field partner to ask for a new loan to invest in lotions to offer her customers as the time for giving presents is approaching. This is why she wants to stock a variety of lotions which can be used for presents. She has had a good experience managing these loans and they have been for her and her famliy a great help in increasing profits.

loans.use: to buy lotions.

loans.name: Omar Genaro

texts.es: El señor Omar tiene como actividad el comercio de artefactos de segunda mano, realiza esta actividad desde hace tres años, el compra un artefacto en donde ve una buena oferta, de amigos, vecinos y de quien este interesado en vender sea televisores, refrigeradores, computadoras, bicicletas, etc. En general cualquier cosa que tenga un valor de reventa, ofrece sus productos mediante tarjetas que distribuye en su taxi a sus mismos clientes y hace la  compra y las entregas sus días libres que son martes viernes y domingo con su  vehículo, cabe señalar que trabaja arduamente para llevar un sustento a su familia, solicita el crédito para la compra de artefactos de segunda mano, El vive junto a sus hijas en su domicilio que esta en anticrético, su esposa reside en Ávila , España hace ya 7 años. Cabe recalcar que su esposa manda remesas cada mes con lo que ayuda a la economía del hogar de don Omar.
texts.en: Señor Omar has a business selling second hand articles which he has been running for the last 3 years, purchasing an item when he sees a good deal from friends, neighbours and whoever is interested in selling whether it be televisions, fridges, computors, bicycles, etc. In general, he buys anything that has a good resale value. He sells his products by cards he distributes in his taxi to his customers. He buys and delivers on his days off which are Tuesdays, Fridays and Sundays with his taxi. It is noteworthy that he works hard to take care of his family. He is asking for the loan to buy second hand goods. He lives with his daughters in his home in Anticrético. His wife has lived in Avila, Spain for the last 7 years. It should be noted that his wife sends remittances every month to help with Don Omar's household expenses.

loans.use: to buy second hand articles.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
Felicita, de 28 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de Nilo, su esposo desde hace 8 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: Josep al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Aymará. Como buena mujer del campo, ella se dedica a las labores de la agricultura, mientras que su esposo se dedica al oficio de albañil, pues le deja mejores ganancias. Los principales sembríos que produce son papa, olluco y oca. Los cuales después de cada cosecha, lo comercializa en la ciudad de Huancayo al menudeo, así ella misma obtiene mayores ganancias. Además de cuidar a sus cerdos y ovejas que posee; los cuales cuida y alimenta con el objetivo de engordarlos y venderlos a un mayor precio. Según cuenta, en temporada de escasez económica, la venta de sus animales le ayuda a mantener los gastos familiares. Ahora su principal objetivo es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Aymara” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente desarrollada, ya que recibirá la ayuda económica que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Por ello promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. 
Felicita de recibir su apoyo; invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para mejorar sus sembríos.
texts.en: Felicita is 28 years old and a happy woman. She lives with Nilo, her husband of 8 years. They have a child Josep who they take care of in their own house, located in the village of Aymara. Like any good rural woman, she works in agriculture while her husband is a bricklayer as it gives him better returns. The main crops she plants are potatoes, oca and olluco (both Andean types of tubers) which she sells retail after the harvest in the city of Huancayo as it gives her more profits. In addition she takes care of pigs and sheep she owns, which she raises and feeds to fatten and sell at a higher price. According to her, in times of economic scarcity, the sale of her animals helps her cover the family expenses. Now, her primary objective is to improve the infrastructure of her house. She belongs to the communal bank "Aymara" annd this is her first loan with MFP with which she feels she has moved forwards as she will receive the financial help she needs to meet her objectives. She therefore promises to be prompt with her repayments. She welcomes your support and will invest in the purchase of fertilizers to improve her crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Maria Isabel pertenece al banco comunal “La Colmena De Pilcopata” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Pilcopata de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco.

Maria Isabel vive  en la  hermosa ciudad de Pilcopata  que está ubicado unos 850 m. s. n. m. Pilcopata tiene diversas zonas de vida y paisajes de extraordinaria belleza escénicas; la geografía y la diversidad biológica del lugar constituyen un atractivo natural de primer orden. 

Maria Isabel trabaja en la municipalidad de Pilcopata en el área de almacén. Ya son varios años que se trabaja en la municipalidad y le va muy bien. 

En esta oportunidad Maria Isabel requiere el préstamo para uso personal como para su educación y para el gasto familiar. 

Maria Isabel agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel belongs to the communal bank "La Colmena de Pilcopata", whose members meet every month in the city of Pilcopata which belongs to the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco.

Maria Isabel lives in this beautiful city which is located at an altitude of 850 meters above sea level.  Pilcopata has diverse life zones and extraordinarily beautiful landscapes.  The geography and biological diversity of the place make for a world class natural tourist attraction.

Maria Isabel works in the municipality of Pilcopata in the warehousing area, where she has been employed for several years.

She is requesting a loan for personal use to pay for education and family expenses.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To pay for personal costs such as education and family expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two French doors.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto, necesita un nuevo préstamo para comprar los materiales necesarios para su nueva siembra, comprara abono y fertilizantes, ya que tiene una milpa de riego por eso está interesado en los materiales para fortalecer la plantación. 
Estos préstamos le han ayudado para mejorar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Rigoberto needs another loan to buy necessary materials for his new planting. He will buy compost and fertilizers because he has an irrigated cornfield and he wants materials to strengthen his crop. 

These loans have helped him and his family to make improvements.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers.

loans.name: Migdalia Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Migdalia Guadalupe es casada, tiene 24 años de edad, curso los grados de educación primaria, se dedica al bordado de blusas, lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, inicio este trabajo aprendiendo con otra señoras y hasta el momento le va bien con este trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas de cruceta e hilos de diferente clases y colores, espera en el futuro ver su negocio amplio y con mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Migdalia Guadalupe, 24, is married and has completed primary education. She makes a living embroidering blouses and has 5 years of experience in this business.

Her spouse supports her. She got started by learning from other women and so far her business has gone pretty well.

She requests a loan that she will use to buy cross-stitch fabrics and sewing threads of different types and colors.

In the future, she expects her business to grow and provide her with a greater income.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and sewing threads to embroider blouses with cross-stitch fabrics.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Doña Virginia es una clienta que tiene 41 años de edad, vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos. Es una señora humilde, trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Se enteró de los servicios que ofrece Fundación Mujer por medio de otra clienta y le pareció la idea. Ella comenzó a generar ingresos propios con la venta de pollo, refrescos gaseosos y golosinas. Ahora ve la necesidad de invertir en una pulpería, debido a que en su comunidad no tiene competencia. Por ésta razón solicita por primera vez un financiamiento a la Fundación. Cuenta con el apoyo de su familia en las decisiones a tomar con respecto a su negocio. Tiene metas por cumplir y con la ayuda en su negocio puede logarlas.
texts.en:
Virginia is a 41 year old client.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has two children.  She is a humble and hard-working woman who is dedicated to her family.

She found out about the services that Fundación Mujer offers from another client.  It seemed like a good idea to her.  By selling chicken, soft drinks, and sweets she started to generate her own income.

She now sees the need to invest in her grocery store because she does not have any competition in her community.  That is why she is requesting a loan for the first time from the Fundación.

She has support from her family in the decisions she makes with respect to her business.  She has goals to meet, and with the help in her business she will be able to achieve them.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es: José, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de tres terneros, abono y herbicidas, para continuar en su trabajo como agricultor y ganadero, estos préstamos representan para José una oportunidad de crecimiento y desarrollo, que lleva junto a él su familia, pues este beneficio no solamente es para uno sino para todos los que viven a su alrededor.
texts.en:
José is requesting a new loan to buy three calves, fertilizer, and herbicides.  He will do this in order to continue his work as a farmer and cattleman.

To José these loans represent the opportunity for growth and development that brings his family together.  This benefit is not only for one person, it is for everyone who lives in his region.

loans.use: to buy three calves, fertilizer, and herbicides.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 44 años es una mujer admirable. Vive en compañía de Ricardo, su esposo. Ambos tienen 7 hijos, pero solo viven con 5 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Aymará. A su corto 18 años comenzó a asumir responsabilidades. Pues tenía una familia a quien cuidar, por ello comenzó a sembrar por si sola toda variedad de tubérculos como: papa, olluco, mashua y oca, los cuales realiza gracias a la ayuda de su esposo. En todo este tiempo lograron muchas cosas como adquirir sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Pero esa no es la única actividad de esta pareja. También teje mantas de lana típicas, con lo que obtienen un dinero extra. A su vez, Juana cría animales entre ovejas, cerdos y burros para carga. Los cuida con mucho esmero ya que gracias a la venta de un ejemplar puede cubrir ciertos gastos del hogar. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia con el dinero que recibirá su esposo, ya que comenzará a trabajar en una mina. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Aymara” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente desarrollada, ya que recibirá la ayuda económica que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Por ello promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Juana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Juana, 44, is an admirable woman. She lives with her husband Ricardo with whom she has 7 children, though only 5 of them live in their home in the town of Aymara. When she was only 18 she began to take on responsibilities because she had a family to take care of. On her own, she began planting a variety of tubers like potatoes, olluco, mashua [tuberous nasturium] and oca [New Zealand yam]. Thankfully, her husband helps her with her work. Over time they have achieved many things, like buying their own farmland. But this is not the couple's only economic activity - they also knit traditional wool blankets, which earns them extra money. Juana also raises animals including sheep, pigs and pack mules. She takes good care of them because the sale of one animal can cover some of their household expenses. Now she hopes to improve her family's quality of life with the money that her husband will receive from his new job working in a mine. 

Juana belongs to the lending group "Aymara" and this is her first loan with MFP, which makes her feel complete because she will receive the financial assistance that she needs to meet her objectives. She promises to make her payments punctually. When she receives her loan, she will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread out among her crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Silvia Carmelina

texts.es:
Silvia, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, por que la institución le ha ayudado con el otorgamiento de préstamos rápidos según su necesidad, en esta ocasión el préstamo será utilizado en la compra de mercadería como arroz, aceite, condimentos, pan, huevos y boquitas, galletas y dulces.
Ella considera que estor préstamos han mejorado el negocio y las condiciones de su familia, pues sus hijos han avanzado con un año más de estudio.
texts.en:
Silvia has decided to ask for a new loan, because the institution has helped her with quick loans according to her need. 

On this occasion the loan will be used to buy merchandise like rise, oil, condiments, bread, eggs, snacks, cookies and candies. She feels that the loans have improved both her business and her family, since her children have advanced another year in their schooling.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, condiments, bread, eggs, snacks, cookies and sweets.

loans.name: Matilde Mariela

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar conocimos a Matilde, tiene 32 años de edad, está soltera y  vive en casa de sus padres, ella estudia Ciencias en la Educación en una Universidad de Manta. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido y responsable.

Ella además de sus estudios también se dedica al comercio, tiene un negocio de venta de materiales de pesca, en su local sus clientes encuentran de todo desde  redes, anzuelos, piolas hasta combustibles y aceites en si todo lo necesario  para realizar una buena faena en alta mar, trabaja todos los días ya que todos los días llegan embarcaciones hasta este lugar, ella compra en Manta sus productos, tiene este negocio por 6 años y  le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, anzuelos, entre otros productos necesarios para la pesca.
 
Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Virgen Del Mar Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the beautiful seaside resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year-round by national and foreign tourists.  Most of the residents here fish or otherwise work in the water for a living.

This is where we met Matilde.  She is 32 years old, single, and lives at home with her parents.  She is studying education science at the Universidad de Manta.  She has been with the communal bank since its inception; she is the treasurer and she likes it because the group is very close and responsible.

Aside from her studies, she also has a business selling fishing supplies.  In her shop, her customers can get everything from nets, hooks, and cord to fuel and oils--in other words, everything needed to work in high seas.  She works every day since boats arrive every day.  She buys her products in Manta.  She has had this business for six years and it has been going well for her.

This loan is to buy nets, hooks, and cord, among other products needed for fishing. 

Her dreams are to finish her studies and to get ahead with her business.

loans.use: to buy nets, cord, hooks, and other fishing products.

loans.name: Florentin

texts.es:
Florentín, nuevamente solicita un préstamo, pues necesita compra materiales agrícolas para el cultivo de maíz, como abono y herbicidas, pues su siembra se encuentra adelantada y quiere dar un nuevo fortalecimiento para que produzca abundantemente.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo para que pudiera realizar el cultivo, dándole una nueva cosecha para el sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
Florentín is asking for a new loan because he needs to buy agricultural supplies for his corn crop such as fertilizer and herbicides.  His sowing is making progress and he wants to strengthen it so it produces plenty.

His previous loan helped him plant his crop, giving him a new harvest to sustain his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, and oil

loans.name: Ana Obdulia

texts.es:
Ana, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo para poder continuar invirtiendo en el negocio, ella está decidida a contraer esta nueva obligación para comprar nueva con la intensión de ofrecer a los clientes nuevos estilos en esta temporada que se acerca, su compra será en blusas casuales y de fiesta, vestidos, camisas, pantalones y faldas.
Ella considera que a través de estos préstamos ha logrado mantenerse y fortalecer el negocio de productos domesticos, por eso hoy quiere experimentar con ropa.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a new loan to be able to continue investing in her business.  She has decided to take on this new obligation to buy new things with the intent of offering her customers new styles for the approaching season.  She will buy casual and formal blouses, dresses, shirts, pants, and skirts.

She believes that these loans have allowed her to take care of herself and strengthen her business selling home products, which is why she now wants to experiment with clothing.

loans.use: to buy casual and formal blouses, dresses, shirts, pants, and skirts

loans.name: Martha Mercedes

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Martha, tiene 38  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 14, 11, 8 y 7 años de edad, la mayor estudia en colegio y las tres menores en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Ella hace dos años y con la ayuda del primer crédito que recibió del banco empezó con un negocio, adecuo un local en su casa para surtir una pequeña  tienda de comestibles,  que con el paso del tiempo y con la ayuda de los créditos la ha ido mejorando,  trabaja todos los días con la ayuda de sus hijos y de su esposo desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde. Ella ha puesto muchas ganas y amor a su tienda y ahora está recogiendo los frutos.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, entre otros productos de primera necesidad. Lleva dos años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos tiene su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener la mejor tienda de la localidad.
texts.en:
The Virgen Del Mar Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the beautiful seaside resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year-round by national and foreign tourists.  Most of the residents here fish or otherwise work on the water for a living.

This is where we met Martha.  She is 38 years old, married, and has four children who are 14, 11, 8, and 7 years old.  The eldest is in high school and the three youngest are in primary school.  Her husband fishes for a living.

She started a business two years ago with the help of the first loan she received from her bank.  She converted part of her home to set up a small food market that with time and the help of loans she has been improving.  She works every day with the help of her children and her husband from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. and sometimes later.  She has put a lot of effort and love into her store and now she is reaping the rewards.

She is going to use this loan to supply her store more.  She will buy rice, sugar, oil, and detergents, among other essentials.  She has been with her communal bank for two years and she likes it because it is thanks to loans that she has her business.

Her dream is to have the best store in the area.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, and other essentials

loans.name: Medalit

texts.es:
Medalit de 20 años de edad, es una joven madre soltera. Ella cuida de Erick, su hijo de apenas 4 meses de nacido. Ella y su bebé viven en la casa de su madre, en la comunidad nativa de Pumpuriani – Chanchamayo. A pesar de estar convaleciente por su reciente parto, Medalit trabaja duro y parejo. Por el momento se dedica a la venta de gaseosas y refrescos helados, así como chupetes y helados en la ciudad de Santa Ana (a media hora de su localidad), para ello adquiere su mercadería un día antes y las refrigera.
A su vez, también cuenta con terrenos de cultivos propios donde siembra maíz y plátanos. “La cosecha de maíz es cada 8 meses y el kilo lo vendo a 0.40 ó 0.50 céntimos”, comenta afirmando la rentabilidad de sus ventas.
El comercio de los granos de maíz a veces tiene decaías, a pesar de ello nunca ha perdido su producción, al fin y al cabo termina recuperando lo invertido. Pero hay meses de abundancia. En marzo y abril el kilo de maíz, llega a costar 1 sol. “Son buenos tiempos”, agrega.
Para este trabajo tiene que recurrir a la contrata de personal operario para agilizar sus labores.
Medalit espera progresar, de tal manera que su hijo cuente con las comodidades que ella no pudo tener. Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP, por eso se siente entusiasta de pertenecer al grupo “Las Thinanis de Pumpuriani”. Afirma que será puntual en el pago de las cuotas.
De obtener el dinero podrá adquirir bolsas de abonos orgánicos para sus cultivos de maíz, así como en el pago de personal operario a quien pagará 25 soles por día.
texts.en:
Twenty-year-old Medalit is a young single mother.  She takes care of Erick, her son who is barely four months old.  She and her baby live at home with her mother in the Native community of Pumpuriani -- Chanchamayo.  Despite being in recovery from recently giving birth, Medalit works hard and fair.  At the moment she is selling cold sodas and drinks, as well as lollipops and ice cream in the city of Santa Ana (half an hour from where she lives).  To do this she gets her merchandise a day in advance and refrigerates it.    

At the same time, she also has her own land where she plants corn and bananas.  As far as the profitability of her sales is concerned, she tells us that she harvests her corn every eight months and sells it at 40 or 50 céntimos per kilo.

The market for corn declines sometimes, but despite that she has never lost her production; in the end she winds up recovering what she invests.  However, there are abundant months; in March and April one kilo of corn can cost up to 1 nuevo sol.  She tells us those are good times.

To do this work she has to hire workers to speed up the process.

Medalit hopes to make enough progress that her son will have comforts that she was never able to have.  This will be her first loan with MFP, which is why she is very enthusiastic about belonging to the Las Thinanis de Pumpuriani Group.  She promises to make her payments on time.

Upon receiving the money she will be able to get bags of organic fertilizers for her corn crops.  She will also be able to hire workers at 25 nuevos soles a day.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizers and to hire workers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread and dyes.

loans.name: Bamco Mujer Hacia El Futuro Group

texts.es:
Doña Denia es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Hacia el Futuro, una mujer con mucho liderazgo, ganas de salir adelante, y ayudar a mujeres de su comunidad. Tiene 49 años, es madre de 7 hijos, todos mayores de edad, y vive actualmente solo con su esposo. Ella es comerciante vende productos por catalogo, cosméticos y perfumes, para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ya que él trabaja en una pequeña finca bananera propia, y los ingresos que genera son muy pocos. 
El crédito va ser de gran ayuda  para la socia, y va a invertir en la compra de mercadería ya que tiene muchos pedido para esta temporada navideña, y además le permitirá aumentar los ingresos familiares, y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su esposo. 
Su meta es que su negocio crezca lo suficiente como para que su esposo deje de trabajar en la finca bananera  y le ayude a ella con las ventas, ya que está muy enfermo. 
Este grupo está compuesto por un total de 11 socias, que realizan diversas actividades agropecuarias y comerciales y van a invertir los créditos en la compra de mercadería y materia prima.
texts.en:
Denia is President of the “Mujer Hacia el Futuro” communal bank.  She’s a woman with good leadership skills and drive to get ahead and help women in her community.  She’s 49 years old and the mother of 7 children, all adults now.  She lives just with her husband now.  She is a merchant selling catalogue merchandise like perfume and cosmetics to help her husband cover household expenses since he works in a small banana farm he owns and income generated is low.

The loan will be of great help for the member since she will invest it in the purchase of merchandise since she has many pending orders this Christmas season and it will also allow her to increase family income and improve her and her husband’s quality of life. Her goal is that her business grows enough so that her husband can stop working on the banana plantation and help her with sales since he’s ill.

This group has a total of 11 members who carry out a variety of activities in animal husbandry and commerce and will be using their loans to buy merchandise and raw materials.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Unidas Para Vencer Group

texts.es:
Banco Comunal Unidas para Vencer esta integrado por diez socias que se dedican a diferentes actividades economicas en la Aldea de San Nicolas en el municipio de Juticalpa. La coordinadora de este Banco se llama Kenia Jacqueline, y ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano y sandalias, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y procreo tres hijos varones.

Hace seis años atras Kenia siguiendo el ejemplo de una de sus vecinas decidio dedicarse a la venta de ropa usada, y compro su primer fardo gracias al apoyo economico de su esposo y aunque no fue mucho, eso le basto para iniciar. Su negocio no tiene nombre porque realiza las ventas de forma ambulante, y de vez en cuando en su hogar cuando sus vecinos o amistades llegan a buscarla. La dificultad mas grande que enfrenta Kenia es la temporada lluviosa porque no puede salir de su casa y pierde de vender y tambien cuando da la mercaderia al credito porque a veces se tardan mucho en cancelarle. 

El prestamo que esta solicitando Kenia lo necesita para comprar un fardo de ropa usada y tambien comprar sandalias para que en esta epoca navideña sus clientes vistan especialmente estilos actuales y a la moda. Con el apoyo de este financiamiento ella podra surtir su negocio de ropa y de sandalias de diferentes colores y estilos para satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Unidas para Vencer” (Together to Succeed) communal bank is composed of ten members who carry out a variety of economic activities in the village of San Nicolás in Juticalpa.  The bank coordinator is Kenia Jacqueline.  She sells used clothes and sandals.  She’s 33 years old, married and has three sons.

Six years ago and following the example of one of her neighbors, Kenia decided to go into used clothes sales and bought her first bundle of clothes thanks to economic help she got from her husband.  Although it wasn’t much, it sufficed to get started.  Her business does not have a name because she is a mobile vendor although sometimes she sells from home when her acquaintances or neighbors come by looking for her.  The biggest difficulty Kenia faces is the rainy season because she can’t leave home and loses sales and also when she sells on credit because sometimes they take a long time to repay her.

Kenia needs the loan she’s asking for to buy a bundle of used clothes and also to buy sandals so that her customers can wear the latest and most up-to-date styles during the Christmas season.  With support from this loan she will be able to stock her business with clothes and sandals in various colors and styles to satisfy customer demand.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothes and sandals

loans.name: Lucio Escobar

texts.es:
Lucio, vive con con su esposa y su hija de 20 años. su trabajo es de aserrador  de madera, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre y por muchos años él ha continuado con esta labor, su horario que tiene son flexibles.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar taladro y madera para aserrar y luego venderla a mejor precio y de esa forma poder darle lo necesario a su familia.
El objetivo de lucio es crecer su negocio  aumentar en clientes de esa forma darles un buen estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Lucio lives with his wife and 20-year-old daughter.  He saws lumber.  He learned this occupation from his father and for many years he’s continued with this work.  His work schedule is flexible.

He needs the loan to buy a drill and lumber to saw and then sell at a better price thus providing his family with what they need.  Lucio’s objective is to grow in business increasing the number of customers to provide a good standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to buy a drill and lumber to saw.

loans.name: Johanna Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Johana, tiene 30  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 9, 7 y 2 años de edad, los mayores estudian en  escuela. Su esposo chofer.

Ella para ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, además también su esposo trae materiales de pesca para vender a comerciantes de este lugar o directamente a pescadores de la zona.  Tanto ella como su esposo trabajan todos los días, el en la venta de materiales de pesca y ella con la venta de ropa, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes y cobra los fines de semana. Lleva tres años en esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y materiales para la pesca. Está en el Banco Comunal 2 años y le gusta porque en el grupo se entretiene y también vende sus productos.

Su sueño es tener un carro para realizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
The “Virgen Del Mar” communal bank meets every two weeks in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year-round by local and foreign tourists alike.  Most of the residents in this area fish and do chores related to the sea.

We met Johana, 30, here.  She’s married and has three children who are 9, 7 and 2 years old.  The older ones attend school.  Her husband’s a driver.

To earn a little on her own to help her husband with household expenses she sell all types of clothing door to door.  Also, her husband brings fishing supplies to sell to merchants in the area or directly to local fishermen.  Both she and her husband work every day selling the fishing supplies and selling clothes.  She sells on credit and collects on weekends.  She’s been in this line of work for three years and does very well.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise like: pants, blouses, t-shirts and fishing supplies.  She’s been in the communal bank two years and likes it because she entertains herself in the group and also sells her products.  Her dream is to have a car to do her sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes and fishing supplies.

loans.name: Maria Carminda

texts.es:
María Carminda, tiene 60 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene 1 hijo de 39 años de edad, vive en Trinidad Santa Bárbara.
Doña María, es una persona activa le gusta mucho el comercio, hace 3 años  estableció un negocio de venta de ropa nueva y usada, como blusas, pantalones faldas, bolsos  y  camisas. Además vende recargas para celulares  y hace costuras, confecciona ropa de todo tipo que le piden sus clientes. Ella siempre ha tenido negocio. Este es su cuarto préstamo solicitado a ODEF, y agradece porque su negocio a crecido, tiene bastantes clientes, actualmente va invertir en ropa usada seleccionada, como vestidos, pantalones faldas y blusas, pues ha visto que se le gana mas, ya que  es barata y logra vender cantidad.
El esfuerzo que hace es por tener un bienestar familiar y mantener surtido el negocio.
texts.en:
María Carminda, 60, is single due to widowhood.  She has a 39-year-old son and she lives in Trinidad, Santa Bárbara.

María is an active person who enjoys commerce very much.  She started a business three years ago selling new and used clothes like blouses, pants, skirts, purses and shirts.  She also sells mobile phone recharges and is a seamstress; she makes all types of clothing as requested by her customers.  She has always had a business.

This is her 4th loan requested of ODEF and she is grateful because her business has grown.  She has quite a few customers and she will invest in selected used clothes like dresses, pants, skirts and blouses on this occasion because she’s noticed that she makes better profits this way because it’s inexpensive and she can sell large amounts.  She makes this effort in order to have family wellbeing and to keep her business well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy new and used clothing.

loans.name: Oscar Leopoldo

texts.es:
Es señor Oscar Leopoldo es casado tiene 55 años de edad,  curso los grados de educación secundaria, tiene 1 hijo el cual esta estudiando, se dedica a presta servicios de trasporte, lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien es maestra de educación.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de repuesto ya que es necesario para que siga trabajando, y mejorar su condición de vida, espera ver su negocio prospero.
texts.en:
The man, Oscar Leopoldo, is 55 years old and married with one child, who is studying.  He finished high school.  He works offering transportation services.  He has 10 years of experience and has the support of his wife, who is an education teacher.

He is requesting a loan that he will use to buy spare parts because it is necessary for him to continue working and to improve his living conditions.  He hopes to see his business prosper.

loans.use: to buy parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies.

loans.name: Unidas Para Alcanzar El Exito Group

texts.es:
El Sr. Jose tiene  50 años trabaja en la municipalidad de su distrito  antes de ingresar al municipio laboraba en una empresa de cerámicas donde  aprendió a realizar varios trabajos artesanales dibujos en alto relieve primero los hacia en miniatura, poco a poco se fue perfeccionando hasta poder realizar diseños en tamaño normal, fue un compañero de trabajo quien lo animo a ofrecer este trabajo a la misma municipalidad es así que empezó realizando diversos trabajos en alto relieve como insignias, animales plantas etc. Este oficio que realiza en sus tiempos libres le generan un ingreso adicional ya son varias instituciones que lo contratan para este tipo de trabajo como restaurantes, colegios y otros municipios, gracias a esto puede darle una mejor educación a su hijo, ahora quiere dedicarle mas tiempo a este oficio con su préstamo comprara algunas herramientas y un pantógrafo que le servirá para realizar los diseños que sus clientes le piden y su préstamo será de mucha utilidad para esto, el Sr. Jose pertenece al grupo “UNIDOS POR ALCANZAR EL ÉXITO”  son 08 socios que lo conforman.


   * El Sr. Jose esta de rodillas con polo blanco.
texts.en:
José is 50 years old and works in the municipality of his district.  Before starting with the town he was working in a ceramics business where he learned to do various artisan jobs, drawings in high relief.  First he made them in miniature, and little by little he perfected them until he was able to make the designs in a normal size.  It was a coworker who inspired him to offer this work to the same municipality.  This is how he began doing different works in high relief such as insignias, animals, plants, etc.

This job that he does in his spare time generates additional income for him because several institutions contract with him for this type of work, including restaurants, schools, and other municipalities.  Thanks to this he can give his son a better education.  Now he wants to dedicate more time to this work.

With his loan he will buy some tools and a pantograph that will help him make the designs that his customers request.  His loan will be a big help for this.

José belongs to the Unidos por Alcanzar el Éxito group, which has eight members.

* José is kneeling and wearing a white polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Edita Dioselina

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Edita, tiene 47  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, ambos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Ella tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa allí vende productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, entre otras cosas, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, allí también vende deliciosos helados que ella prepara y que son de mucho agrado de sus clientes,  ella lleva en este negocio por más de 5 años y desde que está recibiendo los créditos se le ha hecho más fácil poder surtir su local.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, entre otros productos de primera necesidad. Lleva tres ciclos en el   Banco Comunal y espera seguir por mucho tiempo.

Sus sueños es seguir adelante y gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
Virgen Del Mar communal bank gathers every 15 days in the beautiful beach resort of San Mateo in Manta city, that is famous for its beautiful beachs that are visited by national and international tourists during all four seasons.

There, most of the population makes a living fishing and conducting sea-related activities. In that location, we met Edita. She is 47, married, with two sons, both of whom are of legal age and still living in her house.

Her husband makes a living fishing. She owns a grocery store in her house, where she sells products such as rice, sugar, oil and dishwashing liquid, among others.

She works 6 AM through 9 PM, and sometimes even later, Monday to Sunday. There she also sells delicious ice cream that she prepares herself and that her customers love.

She has been in this business for more than 5 years and since she started to receive the loans, it has been easier for her to supply her business with goods.

She will use this loan to buy products for her store, such as rice, sugar, oil, dishwashing liquid and other first priority products.

This is her third loan cycle in this communal bank and she expects to continue there for a long time. Her dream is to get ahead and be healthy.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, dishwashing liquid and other first priority products.

loans.name: Edgar Geovani

texts.es:
El señor es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica al servicio de transporte, inicio este trabajo debido a la necesidad de contar con dinero y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de un repuesto que se le fue a su auto, espera en el futuro tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en: He is single and 25 years old; he never went to school.  He provides transportation services.  He started this work because he needed to have money and to date has five years’ experience.  He’s asking for a loan to buy a spare part he needs for his car.  In the future he hopes to have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.es: El señor Rosalio de 38 años es casado y tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida; por tal motivo decidió poner un negocio familiar en el que pudieran tenerlo en su propia vivienda y que su esposa lo atendiera para que esté al tanto de las necesidades de cada uno. Rosalio es un hombre muy trabajador aunque por las tardes ayuda en el negocio también cuenta con un taxi en el que traslada de un lugar a otro a sus clientes. En este momento su mayor prioridad es comprar mercancía para el negocio como lo es refrescos, botanas, comida de lata, lácteos, tortillas y mas, ya que en esta temporada de Navidad sus ventas se incrementan por lo que necesita tener el negocio abastecido para que pueda tener un ingreso más alto. De esta manera el podrá comprar los regalos a sus pequeños y algunas cosas necesarias para el hogar.
texts.en:
Rosalío, 38, is married and has three children that he wants to provide a better quality of life for.  Because of this he decided to open a family business that he could have at home so that his wife could tend to it while watching over their needs. Rosalío is a very hardworking man who helps with the business in the evenings because he also has a taxi that he uses to transport customers from place to place.  

At present, his greatest priority is to buy merchandise for the store like soft-drinks, snacks, canned food, dairy products, tortillas and more because during the Christmas season sales increase and he needs to have the store well-stocked so that he can earn higher income and be able to buy gifts for his little ones and a few things that are needed in the home.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, groceries in general, dairy products and others.

loans.name: Laura Nely

texts.es: Laura Nely y su esposo son una pareja muy estable que desean ofrecer a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida, al igual brindarles protección y seguridad, la casa que tienen es de interés social aunque es un hogar digno y cómodo para vivir, los espacios de estas casas son muy pequeños, las bardas que colindan de un vecino a otro están muy bajas como de 1 metro y medio por lo que en algunas ocasiones tienden a ser robadas las viviendas. Para Laura es muy importante levantar un poco más la barda de block ya que provisionalmente puso tarimas alrededor para que estuviera cubierta. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar block, cemento, varillas y pagar la mano de obra de esta manera tendrá la seguridad que desea para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Laura Nely and her husband are a very stable couple who want to offer their two children a better quality of life as well as protection and security.  The house they have is government subsidized and even though it’s a proper, comfortable house to live in, the spaces in these houses are very small and the walls separating it from neighbors are very low; they are about a meter and a half high which sometimes leads to the houses being burgled.

For Laura, it’s very important to raise the concrete block wall a bit more; she has installed some wood pallets to raise it for the time being, but to do the project she must buy concrete blocks, cement, rebar and pay labor costs so that she can have the security she wants for her children.

loans.use: to erect a wall.

loans.name: Miriam Francisca

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la      mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

La señora Miriam es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ella financia su negocio, tiene 40  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 18, 14 y 9 años de edad, los dos menores estudian en colegio y escuela. Todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja tres días de la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada quince días ya es en esos días que llegan los pescadores de alta mar y es allí que aprovecha de hacer la mayoría de sus ventas. Lo que más vende son los perfumes y los cosméticos. Ella lleva tres años dedicada a este negocio.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas y cosméticos.

Su sueño es arreglar su casa ya que aún le faltan algunos acabados.
texts.en:
The “Virgen Del Mar” communal bank meets every two weeks in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year-round by local and foreign tourists alike.  Most of the area residents fish and do other chores related to the sea.

Miriam is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because she’s able to finance her business with the loans.  She’s 40 years old, married and has three children who are 18, 14 and 9 years of age; the two younger ones attend secondary and elementary school.  All the children still live at home and her husband’s a fisherman.

She is a housewife who in order to earn her own resources sells Yanbal brand products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women’s accessories) door to door.  She works three days a week.  She sells on credit and collects payment every two weeks which is when fishermen return from the high seas and that’s when she makes most of her sales.  What she sells the most are perfumes and cosmetics.  She’s been in this business three years.

She will use the loan to buy perfume, creams and cosmetics.  Her dream is to finish her house because it still needs some final details.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La señora Juana  es una señora de edad adulta y no por ello es impedimento para realizar algunas actividades, es una mujer emprendedora; con ganas de trabajar y salir adelante. Desde hace diez años inicio un negocio en un cuarto de su casa con el deseo de hacerlo más grande, la señora comenta que empezó con poco capital y con el tiempo las ganancias le permitirán surtir mas su tienda de abarrotes. Ahora ella muy preocupada porque su negocio sea prosperado al igual que ella y su familia quiere invertirle para que así puedan ver más ganancias y seguir con su proyecto. Con este crédito será el 5 crédito el cual agradece ya que le ayudado mucho en su economía familiar. Su esposo es un agricultor de alfalfa que la vende a otras partes de la ciudad y rancherías de por aquí cerca. Juna quiere comprar mercancía como refrescos, botanas, lácteos, abarrote en general, pan, tortillas y más.
texts.en: Señora Juana  is an older woman, but this is not an obstacle for her and she is still involved with several activities. She is a hard-working woman, who wants to work and get ahead. Ten years ago, she started a business in a room of her house, with the desire of expanding the business. Juana comments that she started with very little capital and, over time, her income allowed her to stock her grocery store more. Now she is very concerned because her business has prospered as has she, and her family wants to invest in order to increase income and continue with her project. This will be her fifth loan, which she appreciates because the loans have helped her greatly with her family finances. Her husband is an alfalfa farmer, who sells in different parts of the city and to nearby settlements. Juana wants to purchase merchandise like soft drinks, snacks, dairy products, groceries, bread, tortillas and more.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her business like groceries and soft drinks.

loans.name: Noe Mauricio

texts.es:
El señor Noe Mauricio es casado, tiene 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa de todo tipos, lleva 10 años de experiencia en este negocio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería, ya que por ser fin de año existe demanda. Espera ver en el futuro un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Noé Mauricio is 37 years old and married with two children, one of whom is a student.  He did not have the opportunity to study.  He works in business selling all types of clothing.  He has ten years of experience in this business.

He is requesting a loan that he will use to buy merchandise, since there is demand because it is the end of the year.  He hopes to have an extensive business in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Paola Katherine

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Paola, tiene 28  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 5 y de 1 año  de edad, el  mayor esta en primero de básica. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja tres días de la semana. Ella lleva cinco años dedicada a este negocio. Por esta ocasión ella también va a utilizar el crédito para comprar material de pesca como son las redes, arpones, combustible y otros materiales para que su esposo ya que él tiene una pequeña embarcación en la que todos los días se dedican  a estas faenas de pesca.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y materiales de pesca. Lleva 4 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por los bajos intereses que se cobran por los créditos.
 
Sus sueños son tener otra lancha para el negocio de su esposo ya que la que tiene es muy pequeña.
texts.en:
The Virgen del Mar communal bank meets every two weeks in the pretty beach community of San Mateo in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that are well visited year round by native and foreign tourists.  The majority of the residents here work in fishing and maritime jobs.

Here we met Paola.  She is 28 years old and married, and has two children from this relationship, ages 5 and 1.  The oldest child is in the first year of elementary school.  Her husband is a fisherman.  She is a housewife who works selling Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories) to have her own income.  She sells door-to-door and works three days a week.  She has been doing this work for five years.

This time she is also going to use the loan to buy fishing supplies such as nets, harpoons, fuel, and other materials for her husband, since he has a small boat on which he works maritime jobs every day.  This loan is to buy perfume, cream, cosmetics, and fishing supplies.

She has been with the communal bank for four years and she likes it because of the low interest rates they charge for the loans.  Her dream is to have a new motorboat for her husband's business since the one he has is very small.

loans.use: to buy perfume, cream, cosmetics, and fishing supplies.

loans.name: Florinda Cruz

texts.es:
La señora Florinda Cruz es casada, tiene 30 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 1 hijos pequeño, inicio este negocio por iniciativa propia y lleva 7 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de productos: aguas gaseosas, jugos, fideos, arroz, flijol, comida en lata, lácteos, etc. espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Florinda Cruz is 30 years old and married with a small child. She has not had the opportunity to study, and started this business on her own initiative and has seven years of experience.

She has applied for this loan to purchase products for her store such as carbonated water, juice, noodles, rice, beans, canned food, milk, etc. In future she hopes to expand and own a large business.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her general store

loans.name: Verónica Gabriela

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar vive la señora Verónica, tiene 27 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, el mayor estudia en escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo tenga los recursos necesarios para poder realizar un gran trabajo, su esposo se dedica a la pesca, el junto a otras personas se van a alta mar  en su pequeña embarcación a realizar sus faenas de pesca, salen en la tarde y no llegan sino hasta el dia siguiente con los productos que les da mar, una vez en la playa entregan los productos a comerciantes mayoristas para que estos los distribuyan a toda la provincia. Llevan 11 años  dedicados a esta dura labor.

Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustibles y alimentos para los días que tienen que estar en alta mar. Lleva tres años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la unión que hay en el grupo.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran barco para que su esposo realice sus faenas de pesca.
texts.en:
The 'Virgen Del Mar' Community Bank meets every 15 days in the beautiful San Mateo resort in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches which are visited throughout the year by both domestic and foreign tourists. Most inhabitants of this area work in fishing or sea-related businesses.

27-year-old Veronica lives in Manta with her partner, who is a fisherman. They have two sons aged seven and two, and the eldest is studying at school.
 
Veronica is a housewife who applied for this loan in order to help her spouse obtain the resources he needs to perform his work well. He is a fisherman, who goes out to sea in his small boat along with other men to carry out their work. They leave in the afternoon and do not return with their produce until the next day. Once they reach the shore, they deliver their produce to wholesalers for distribution throughout the province. They have been working hard at this tough business for 11 years.

This loan will be used to buy nets, lanyards, fuel and food for the days that they have to be at sea. Veronica has been a member of the bank for three years and she enjoys the unity that they have within the group. Her dream is to own a large boat for her partner to carry out his fishing operations.

loans.use: to buy nets, lanyards, fuel and food for her partner's fishing business

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Yanacoto Group

texts.es: Pamela es socia de la Alcancía Comunal “Santa Rosa de Yanacoto” grupo conformado por 09 integrantes, la cual tiene más de 03 años trabajando con el Programa-Prosperidad. Pamela tiene 23 años de edad es soltera, actualmente vive con sus padres. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de chocolates donde luego los ofrece a la gente de su zona, la cual  lleva trabajando de esta manera mas de 02 años, gracias a este negocio a podido concluir su carrera de Hotelería y Turismo, aparte de este negocio hace 02 meses empezó a  trabajar en una fábrica de donde obtiene un ingreso mas.  El deseo de Pamela es poner una juglería en su vivienda donde también pueda ofrecer sus productos de chocolates, y así poder ahorrar para sus estudios próximos ya que una de sus metas es  estudiar la carrera Universitaria de Arquitectura. Ella solicito el crédito para comprar insumos para la preparación de chocolates como azúcar, leche, vainilla, manteca y materiales como cajas decorativas, ya que por campaña navideña tiene pedidos que entregar. La Alcancía Comunal “Santa Rosa de Yanacoto” agradece el crédito brindado. Pamela es la que está de pie al lado derecho y viste un polo color fucsia. Sra. Cecilia  no está presente en el desembolso por motivo de trabajo, del Sr. Benito se adjunta la fofo en la parte superior de la fotografía.
texts.en:
Pamela, one of nine members of Santa Rosa de Yanacoto Communal Bank, has been working with Programa Prosperidad for more than three years.  Pamela, 23, is single and currently lives with her parents.

She works making chocolates which she later sells to the people in her area.  She has been working like  this for more than two years.  Thanks to this business she has been able to finish her studies in hotel and tourism management.  In addition to this business, two months ago she began working in a factory, which gives her additional income. 

Pamela's goal is to set up a juice bar in her home where she also can offer her chocolate products.  In this way she will be able to save for her future studies, since one of her goals is to study architecture in the university.

She requested the loan to buy supplies for making chocolate, such as sugar, milk, vanilla, and lard, and materials like decorative boxes, since she has Christmas orders to deliver.  Santa Rosa de Yanacoto Communal Bank is grateful for the loan offered.

Pamela is the one standing on the right side, wearing a fuchsia polo shirt.  Cecilia was not able to be present at the distribution because of work and Sr. Benito appears in the small photo in the upper corner of the photograph.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, vanilla, lard, and decorative boxes.

loans.name: Sandra Alicia

texts.es:
La Señora. Sandra es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive en el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por sus hermosos paisajes, sus cuatro ríos quienes bañan a la ciudad, su gente es muy amable y cordial, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

La Señora. Sandra tiene 30 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido una niña de 8 años de edad  que estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado público, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Sandra se dedica a la atención de una tienda de comestibles, en la cual labora hace 2 años de domingo a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda.

Su sueño es no tener deudas.
texts.en:
Señora Sandra is a member of the community bank Fuerza Trabajadora. She lives in the center of the city of Cuenca. This city is characterized by its beautiful scenery and the four rivers that bathe the city. Its people are very kind and cordial; they maintain the culture and traditions of their parents.

Señora Sandra is 30 years old. She is married and has a daughter of 8 who attends a little city school. Her husband works as a public employee. They don't have their own house, so they rent.

Doña Sandra tends a grocery store, where she has worked for two years, every day of the week, from 7 in the morning until 10 at night.

She is in her second loan cycle in her community bank, and she is going to invest this loan in the purchase of basic goods to stock her store.

Her dream is to have no debts.

loans.use: to buy basic products to stock her store.

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señora. Blanca es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive en el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por sus hermosos paisajes, sus cuatro ríos quienes bañan a la ciudad, su gente es muy amable y cordial, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

La Señora Blanca tiene 19 años de edad, vive en unión libre y en su unión conyugal ha concebido una niña de 2 años de edad. Su esposo labora en una carpintería, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 
Ella labora medio tiempo en un bar y el resto de su tiempo lo dedica a su familia y también a vender joyas de plata, vende estos productos recorriendo la ciudad.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga. Su crédito lo va a invertir para comprar joyas para incrementar este negocio.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Señora Blanca is a member of the community bank Fuerza Trabajadora. She lives in the center of the city of Cuenca. This city is characterized by its beautiful scenery and the four rivers that bathe the city. Its people are very kind and cordial; they maintain the culture and traditions of their parents.

Señora Blanca is 19 years old. She lives in a common-law marriage and has a daughter who is 2 years old. Her husband works in a carpentry shop. They don't have their own house, so they rent.

She works half time in a bar. She dedicates the rest of her time to her family and also to selling silver jewelry. She travels throughout the city to sell these products.

This is her first loan with her community bank, to which she was invited by a friend. She will invest her loan in buying jewelry to increase her business.

Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Libia Graciela

texts.es:
La Señora Libia es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive en el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por sus hermosos paisajes, sus cuatro ríos quienes bañan a la ciudad, su gente es muy amable y cordial, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

Doña Libia tiene 55 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son todos casados, dos de sus hijos viven independientes y solo uno vive en su casa con quien comparte los gastos de su hogar. Su esposo labora como empleado público, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

La Señora. Libia labora en un local donde se dedica a la venta de CD de música y películas, actividad en la que se encuentra hace 8 años, también vende cosméticos de varias marcas hace 4 años y en fechas especiales se dedica a la venta de adornos.

Se encuentra reingresando en el banco comunal. Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de CD de música, películas, cosméticos y adornos navideños para sus negocios. 

Su meta es crecer  mucho más en sus negocios.
texts.en:
Libia is a member of the 'Fuerza Trabajadora' community bank.  She lives in Cuenca city center.  This city is well known for its beautiful landscapes, its four rivers which bathe the city, and its kind and friendly people who maintain the culture and traditions of their parents.

Libia is 55 years old, married, and has three children who are all married.  Two of her children live independently and one still lives at home and shares in the household expenses.  Libia's husband works as a public employee.  They do not own their own home but live in a rental house.

Libia sells music CDs and movies.  She has been in this business for eight years.  She also sells various brands of cosmetics and has been in that business for four years.  On special occasions, she also sells ornaments.

Libia is re-joining her community bank.  She will invest her loan in buying music CDs, movies, cosmetics and ornaments for her businesses.

Libia's goal is to grow a lot more in her businesses.

loans.use: to buy music CDs, movies, cosmetics and Christmas ornaments

loans.name: Masudi

texts.en:
Masudi is a married man who owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family.

For the past ten years, Masudi has operated a retail shop business, selling to his neighbours and passersby. He faces the major challenge of competition from other retail shop operators. Additionally, he also operates a boda boda (motorcycle) business, which provides another source of income.

With his KES 50,000 loan, he wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a married woman with four children, three of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is the rent bill.

For the past year, she has operated a mat weaving business, selling at the market to her neighbours and passersby. Additionally, she also sells milk, which provides another source of income. She faces the major challenge of seasonality, since her business depends on tourists. She dreams of establishing business premises in the future.

With her KES 20,000 loan, she wants to establish a retail shop business, purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and rice. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to establish a retail shop business, purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and rice.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
This is Ellen.  She is 51 years old, married, and has three children aged 29, 22 and 15 years. She has one additional dependent, who lives with her because she was adopted. 

In 1996, Ellen established her pub business. She began her business because her husband’s salary was not enough to support their family, so she had to sell drinks to get extra income to help her husband provide a livelihood for their children. Working seven days a week and 16 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,800,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le.3,000,000 in order to buy more drinks for her business. 

In the future, Ellen plans to send her children overseas to study and to build a dwelling house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more drinks for her pub.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is a single woman with one child who lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

For past two years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of establishing a wholesale business in the future.

With her KES 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is a married woman with seven children; five attend school while two are still too young for school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past two years, she has operated a "bodaboda" (motorcycle transport) business; her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of motorcycle breakdown. She dreams of expanding her business to meet her customer needs in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase fuel and spare parts for her motorcycle. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase fuel and spare parts for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Mwero
